summary: April 20 is the 110th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
Peter Soyer Beagle  is an American novelist and screenwriter, especially fantasy fiction. His best-known work is The Last Unicorn , a fantasy novel he wrote in his twenties, which Locus subscribers voted the number five "All-Time Best Fantasy Novel" in 1987. During the last twenty-five years he has won several literary awards including a World Fantasy Award for Life Achievement in 2011.
^ "Peter S Beagle". Movies & TV . The New York Times. Retrieved 2012-01-19.
